website_summaries.verdict: A sparkly and over-the-top playset filled with surprises and reveals for kids who like a good dance party.
pros: Includes 2 dolls to enjoy the partying
On multiple levels, there are lots of spaces including a DJ booth, dressing room, and performance stage complete with a disco ball
Secret reveals include a spinning dance floor, sliding dressing room curtains, and seating that pops out from the VIP stage
Includes a limousine, camera with tripod, chair, microphone, and guitar
cons: It is difficult to fit all of the accessories into the case and close it

customer_reviews.title: Very top heavy - topples over constantly
customer_reviews.text: The compact is a little bigger than others. It’s cute, comes with the limo, a microphone, cupcakes, chair, camera/filming tripod, guitar and 2 dolls. My daughter enjoys playing with it, but gets frustrated because it’s so top heavy it keeps falling over. This is the main reason for the 3 stars. She can’t spend 5 mins playing without it toppling over because it’s so top heavy. Another bad thing about this playset is that the limo doesn’t fit inside to store it. The last complaint I have is the guitar. The photo shows the red headed doll “playing” the guitar. You can’t seem to get the guitar over the dolls head, much less around the arm.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica C.

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: This larger Polly Pocket set is a great quality for the price. You get some great accessories (like the limo which is really cute!) and the set is really fun. The Polly stick concept is fun, although it isn't too much better than the original snap in Polly feet in the vintage sets. Polly can only stick where there is a sticker, and you can't place stickers "anywhere", only on smooth surfaces. So it isn't a huge improvement over the vintage sets. But the play value is still great.
customer_reviews.author: Stapayr8485

customer_reviews.title: cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when Polly Pocket made a reappearance! I got this one for my daughter and it's super cute - she loves it! the extra little stickers she can put other places to make polly stand are great and it's pretty durable.. she's pretty rough on toys but nothing is broken yet and we've had it for a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Elise MacBello

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We are huge Polly fans! My daughter collects them, the old ones we have been buying on eBay from when I was a kid. We were so thrilled when we saw there were new ones out! This ones bigger than the old one, the only thing we dislike is that the dolls are rubber. I wish they'd fix that, these dolls won't last years like the originals. But it's not such a big deal that we won't buy them all. We will!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Clear

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very cute toy!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very cute! My granddaughter was looking on Amazon with me, and started shrieking when she saw this. One of her friends has it, and she loves it...She asked for one for Christmas, and I'm happy I purchased it. It's really very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Junky toy! Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this for my daughter, but it fell short. They have little Pins that connect the two pieces together, which are plastic and do not stay in at all. I was constantly trying to put it back in so it could stay together. I ended up losing one pin and it doesn’t shut properly. Even when we had the pins in it is awful to shut. It feels like a McDonald’s toy. Really poorly made. The accessories are cute. That’s about the only positive thing I can say. I ended up returning it. Cheap piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Allmanjoy

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it and bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's second Polly Pocket and she absolutely loves it. We were both pleasantly surprised at how large it was when it came in the mail. It is much larger than the other one she already has that was the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad manufacture job
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the package Christmas morning my daughter was so excited. The van fell out snd the wheel popped out of the package. The wheel wasnt even properly placed on in manufacturing so we cant fix it. Bummed little girl
customer_reviews.author: tammy toombs

customer_reviews.title: Meh other Pilot Pockets are better options
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute however the limo does not fit in the case and the white little pegs that are supposed to hold the case together fall out super easily. My daughter lost one of the little white pegs within a few days of receiving this so now the case won’t close properly/stay closed. My daughter has a lot of Polly pockets -this one is a fail. Otherwise it is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dichter

customer_reviews.title: Small pieces can get lost, but It’s a fun toy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my seven-year-old granddaughter for Christmas along with another Polly Pocket and she loves them both. I like the fact that all the pieces fit in a carry case except with this one. The little bus will not fit inside the case.
customer_reviews.author: Diversity

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift...
customer_reviews.text: My Niece really seemed to like it, so I guess it's a five star product! I will mention that I had to send the first order back, as the box was damaged enough that I would feel like a chump if I gave it as a gift in that condition.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive the little screws to put the Polly pocket together so disappointing I got this one and another and neither one had the screws to put em together my girls were disappointed on Christmas morning
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The shipping box was pristine but this item was opened and the box torn, but I don't have the ability to make a return for a replacement item because I needed it for a Tuesday, initial delivery was Sunday. Cannot tell if everything is included in the torn box or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Gift for our daughter
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our daughter. She was thrilled to get it and begin playing with it. Only downside is that all the pieces do really fit inside. The limo has to be left out...but she does really like playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: L Davis

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift and my daughter loves it. The car does not fit inside the box with the rest of the pieces. It would be nice if it did.
customer_reviews.author: Cat_i

customer_reviews.title: Very fun set!
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was larger than I thought it would be, making it a wonderful, giftable set. Looks like it has lots of fun parts, and will be enjoyed! Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea in Arkansas

customer_reviews.title: Save your money..
customer_reviews.text: They don't make them like they used to. Cheap feeling plastic parts, the clasp to close it snapped off and the wheels on the car broke too. Polly pocket is also rubber now and likes to collect dog hair, She looks like Chewbacca now.
customer_reviews.author: AZLove

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This came to be completely torn apart. The box was halfway open and a lot of the parts that we needed to put it together were missing. We made it work, fortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey D

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my grand daughter busy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grand daughter loves Polly Pocket. It does have small pieces but is good for hand coordination. I am looking to buy her some more Polly Pockets to play with.

customer_reviews.title: Great “Little” Set!
customer_reviews.text: We love Polly Pockets! Our 7 year old daughter loves to bring them when we go out (restaurants, family’s homes where there are no little kids, etc). This set is great, gives her a lot of room to use her imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer dpg

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with all the parts!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with a screw that’s required to put the case together and open and close it properly...it was a Christmas present and you know how easy it is to take away a present from a 5 yr old for return...

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not made well.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Polly pockets! This one is great but the latches that you put on fall out so easy. We have lost them about 10 times... stinks because if you can’t find them it ruins the whole toy. :/
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The little girls love it

customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this I thought it would be a small toy. For the price it was a beautiful gift and my sister plays with it all the time!! Good for traveling as well

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this gift. It's very cute and reminds me of the old polly pocket. However, we are unable to fit the van in compartment when packing if up.

product_meta.title: Polly Pocket Hidden Places Dance Par-taay! Case with Dance Theme, Dolls & Accessories
product_meta.description: The Polly Pocket Hidden Places Dance Par-taay! Case is caboodle-shaped and opens to reveal a larger dance-themed Polly world that is great to take on-the-go for movin' and groovin' play anytime! The Dance Par-taay! Case comes with Polly and Lila dolls and opens to reveal these areas: upstairs DJ booth; stairs to dressing room area; and performance stage with disco ball. There's also many secret reveals: spin the chocolate fountain to make the dance floor spin and the dolls stick to the dance floor; twist the disco ball and it makes the turntables on the DJ booth spin; the dressing room curtain slides; seating swings out from under the VIP stage; and a table turns into a dessert counter. There's also a limo to get the girls to the dance party on time, plus camera with tripod, chair, microphone and guitar that slips over doll's shoulder to start strumming! It's the best Dance Par-taay! ever! Polly Pocket Hidden Places Dance Par-taay! Case includes secret reveals, Polly and Lila dolls plus accessories and sticker sheet. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: Polly Pocket Hidden Places Dance Par-taay! Case is caboodle-shaped and opens to reveal a larger dance-themed Polly world!
Great to take on-the-go for movin' and groovin' play anytime!
Includes Polly and Lila dolls and case opens to reveal: upstairs DJ booth; stairs to dressing room area; and performance stage with disco ball

There's also secret reveals: spin the chocolate fountain and the dance floor spins (dolls stick to the dance floor); twist the disco ball and turntables on the DJ booth spin; dressing room curtain slides; seating swings out from under the VIP stage; and a table turns into a dessert counter
A limo (included) gets the girls to the dance party on time!
